name: URLCredential.Persistence
desc: Constants that specify how long the credential will be kept.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The credential should not be stored.

items.name: case forSession
items.desc: The credential should be stored only for this session.

items.name: case permanent
items.desc: The credential should be stored in the keychain.

items.name: case synchronizable
items.desc: The credential should be stored permanently in the keychain, and in addition should be distributed to other devices based on the owning Apple ID.
